infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to access your calendar
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RN-Course uses your camera to scan project QR codes. RN-Course experiences you open may use the camera with the RN-Course camera API.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to access your contacts
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to use your location
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to access your microphone
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to access your device's accelerometer
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Give RN-Course experiences permission to save photos
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Give RN-Course experiences permission to access your photos
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow RN-Course experiences to access your reminders
